00078 #ifndef _WIN32
00079 # error This file is only currently defined for compilation on Win32 systems
00080 #endif /* _WIN32 */
00081 
00082 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00083  * Constants and definitions
00084  */
00085 
00086 #define PROT_READ       (0x01)          
00087 #define PROT_WRITE      (0x02)          
00088 #define PROT_EXEC       (0x04)          
00089 #define PROT_NONE       (0x00)          
00091 #define MAP_PRIVATE     (0x02)          
00092 #define MAP_ANONYMOUS   (0x20)          
00093 #define MAP_FIXED       (0x10)          
00095 #ifdef _WIN64
00096 # if defined(__GNUC__)
00097 #  define MAP_FAILED      ((void*)(long long)~0)    
00098 # elif defined(_MSC_VER)
00099 #  define MAP_FAILED      ((void*)(__int64)~0)      
00100 # else /* ? compiler */
00101 #  error Currently only GCC and VC++ compilers are recognised for Win64
00102 # endif /* compiler */
00103 #else /* ? _WIN64 */
00104 # define MAP_FAILED      ((void*)~0)                
00105 #endif /* _WIN64 */
00106
